mapper.insert: insert into notice_mst values( 0, #{notice_title}, #{user_code}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_count}, now(), now() );

insert into notice_file values
( 0, #{file.notice_code}, #{file.file_name}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select nm.notice_code, nm.notice_title, um.user_id, nm.create_date, nm.notice_count, (select count(*) from notice_mst nm left outer join user_mst um on(um.user_code = nm.user_code)
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') or nm.notice_content like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where um.user_id like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
) as total_notice_count from notice_mst nm left outer join user_mst um on(um.user_code = nm.user_code)
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') or nm.notice_content like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where um.user_id like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
order by notice_code desc limit #{index}, 10;
